achievement.this_is_new.desc: Smelt a new metal from the Base Metals mod
achievement.blocktastic.desc: Place a metal block that is neither iron nor gold
achievement.geologist.desc: Make a hammer from a metal block
achievement.brass_maker.desc: Combine powdered copper and zinc to make brass
achievement.bronze_maker.desc: Combine powdered copper and tin to make bronze
achievement.electrum_maker.desc: Combine powdered silver and gold to make electrum
achievement.steel_maker.desc: Combine powdered iron and powdered charcoal to make steel
achievement.invar_maker.desc: Combine powdered iron and nickel to make invar
achievement.mithril_maker.desc: Combine powdered silver, devil-iron and mercury to make ghost silver
achievement.aquarium_maker.desc: Combine powdered copper and zinc with prismarine crystals to make fish-steel
achievement.demon_slayer.desc: Wear a full suit of devil-iron armor and wield a cold-iron sword
achievement.angel_of_death.desc: Wear a full suit of ghost silver armor and wield a mithril sword
achievement.scuba_diver.desc: Wear a full suit of fish-steel armor and swim under water
achievement.juggernaut.desc: Wear a full suit of unbreakable armor
achievement.moon_boots.desc: Wear a pair of star-steel boots
